# llms.txt for wasp.sh
# This site allows LLMs to crawl and use its content.
# Contact: info@wasp-lang.dev
User-Agent: *
Disallow:

# The Wasp Full-stack Framework
Wasp is a full-stack framework with batteries included for React, Node.js, and Prisma.

# Full Documentation
- [Complete LLM-formatted Wasp Documentation](https://wasp.sh/llms-full.txt)

# Individual documentation sections and guides:
